comment.author: 59573650@N06
comment._content:
Fabulous old town seated by the water in co. Dingle.  Dingle town is also a must see.
Nice restaurants featuring the local fish and the scenery is to die for.  The best thing
is to start at Tralee and do the coast road along the peninsula....or you can also try the
O'Connor Pass which will keep you glued to your seat...a bit scarey, but the view from the
top and down is unreal...you just might love it!!
